bibl.title: The Female Element of the Political Self-Fashioning of the Diadochi: Ptolemy, Seleucus, Lysimachus, and their Iranian Wives.
bibl.note: See in part. pp. 203-206: Ptolemy and Artacama.

bibl.title: After Alexander. The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC).

bibl.seg: Sabine Müller, The Female Element of the Political Self-Fashioning of the Diadochi: Ptolemy, Seleucus, Lysimachus, and their Iranian Wives.
Víctor Alonso Troncoso & Edward M. Anson (edd.), After Alexander. The Time of the Diadochi (323-281 BC) (Oxford - Oakville, CT, 2013) pp. 199-214.
See in part. pp. 203-206: Ptolemy and Artacama.
